exceptions.tactic: unfold divide in |- *; intros R H' a b d H'0 H'1; elim H'0; intros q EQ; elim H'1; intros q0 EQ0.

exceptions.exn: The reference EQ was not found in the current environment.

original: unfold divide in |- *; intros R H' a b d H'0 H'1; elim H'0; intros q EQ; elim H'1; intros q0 EQ0. rewrite EQ; rewrite EQ0. exists (q + q0)%N; ring.
